API Reference¶

Core modules (auto-documented):

FastAPI application entrypoint and wiring.

Async SQLAlchemy engine and session dependency for the API.

async app.db.session.init_db()[source]¶

Test-only helper; production migrations should use Alembic.

Return type:

None

Model imports for SQLModel metadata discovery.

Alembic autogenerate uses SQLModel.metadata. Importing this module registers all table models by importing their modules, so keep new models listed here.
